this fi shock ss 725rp ac works  our 11 yr  old labrador decided to start digging at garden age 9 as there is a cider block barrier wal at the back of it  that the garden fence seperated the dog from  mice find the wal as an oasis because our dog who patroled the wall religiously  can now no longer get there to keep them away  he therefore could not stay out of our 20x20 garden  once a fence went up  we have a chicken wire fence around it  and he just dug at the bottom constantly  we installed this unit and it quickly stopped him  we heard him yelp aboout 3x s  and that was all that was needed it is not most convienient to have to plug it in  but the price break for an ac unit compared to a solar unit makes up for this  we turned it off a few times  and our dog would know so i assumed they can feel a vibration or hear a frquency  but that theory fell through as it has been unplugged for a month now and no digging it works great for us i plan to put in at the base of the porch where we buily a shed where the our dog digs like crazy  as there are mice or moles around it  it really works  also those plastic owls thatyou can purchase seem to keep squirrels nd birds form eating tomatoes  peppers and so on   hope to store it and use it again next summer  i totally recomend it  if you have a digging dog in the garden  thisworks

i commented on someones review of this product whos dog became very ill  which caused me to look at some of the other negitive reviews and i would like to offer information about this product and my experiance with smokehouse   i have purchased this brand for many years  i have also purchased other brands  none of my dogs has every gotten sick from a smokehouse bone  at one point i purchased a bag of 3 bones that were a differant brand  when i opened up the bag a cloud of mold poofed into the air  obviously i didnt give them to my dogs  my point is this the brand this happened with is well known and reliable  but that doesnt mean nothing ever goes wrong   most people at sometime in their life have purchased a moldy loaf of bread  or cheese or even gone to a resturant where there was something very definantly wrong with the food  it may not happen often but when it does its dangerous  and unpleasant  but we still continue to buy food at the grocery store and go to resturants there are differances in opinions of even vets as to whether or not you should use properly cured beef bones or raw hide chews  i have never had a problem with the cured beef bones from smokehouse and i know of vets that recommend bones vs rawhide chews and rawhide chews vs cured beef bones  yes pieces of bone can be broken off  swallowed  and then get lodged in the system  i also know of dogs that have had rawhide chews that have caused serious health issues  if a dog gets a large enough piece of rawhide swallowed  contrary to what some think it does not get fully digested and can also cause vomiting and even a blockage when you deal with food whether its for pets or humans things do go wrong the smokehouse bones keep my dogs teeth free of tartar  they have fun  im happy and have never had a problem  i under no circumstances will give my dogs rawhide anything  ive know of several dogs that have had issues with rawhide and only one dog that had a minor problem with a cured beef bone and it was not a smokehouse bone  smokehouse is an excellant brand

this stuff stinks but your dog will love it   if your dog is a fussy eater  mine are not   or if they re feeling under the weather  supplement this or any of the tripett blends  and you will be surprised how well your dog responds  i read about the benefits of green tripe when one of my dogs became very ill and could not handle dry dog food anymore   i switched both dogs to a raw diet and tripett  and presto  a remarkable rebound in their health and appearance   i was feeding a very high grade dry food at the time  so i did not go from junk food to high quality  it is just that dogs need to eat whole  raw foods not cooked processed meal  it s the carbs in dog food that create most of the skin and health issues not grains   carbs turn to sugar and then to yeast   it is the yeast that causes ear infections and bad skin and coat  i don t work for tripett  just a good customer  this stuff stinks

i had no idea this water was black  i thought it was just the packaging and as i was driving had no idea until i looked down  shocked to see that the plastic bottle was indeed transparent  so  completely unbiased  i thought that the water tasted just like another alkaline water   alka pure   which is in the same price bracket  i have no idea as to the veracity of claims fulvic minerals are good for you or not but the taste of this water  and the cool fact that it is indeed black  put it at the top of my list for expensive bottled water  no idea what people are talking about that the taste is  salty  or weird  it obviously has a slightly metallic taste because of the mineral content which i vastly prefer over the calcium softness or chorine tinged waters available by tap or cheap mass production  hope that common sense will prevail over the overwhelmingly negative reviews this product seems to get  if people can look past the black  which i think is its chief selling point   then i think consumers will ultimately champion this water  best water on market

i ve been buying this product for years   it is definitely the best baby white cheddar cheese popcorn i have tried   for those who love strong cheese flavour  this is the strongest you will find  at least that i know of    i wish they made it in extra sharp  but they probably wanted a  middle of the road  cheese for the majority of consumers who might find extra sharp too strong for them in any event  there really aren t that many companies that make baby white popcorn with cheddar cheese in the first place   the larger sized corn and yellow corn just are not the same quality as baby white  cheese or no cheese that crap made by smartfood that is sold in the markets is horrendous  not to mention lots of partially popped kernels    the popcorn made by deep river has less hulls because it is baby sized  which is better for the digestive track  especially for those of us that are older    also less partially popped kernels than the other brands i have tried there is great popcorn out of colorado  cornzapoppin  made fresh just before shipping  but it is full sized   the flavours are great  but there s just nothing like baby white corn  did i say that already     it s also rather expensive  but does make a great gift for those you want to spend money on so until someone else makes a high quality baby white sharp cheddar popcorn  i am loyal to this deep river snacks product  best baby white cheddar popcorn on the market

i use to be able to set my watch to af after iud  copper  i became irregular  would skip atleast 2 mos no longer have iud still irregular  went to the dr  the prescriptions came out  i don t take hormones or b control because it does not work well w  my system at all        so that was out  you would think that the dr  would try alternatives knowing that depo almost killed me  one shot  only but not quite  of course not  right  story short after labs i needed to balance my hormones naturally  i had all kinds of symptoms from the imbalance  e g   sore nips  tired  not sleeping well  irritated and retaining unwanted weight to say the least even working out not loosing as fast as i know i should  i thought i would try this tea  now i have a really sensitive system  i don t drink i don t smoke and if there is a side effect usually i would get it  i drank this tea  one bag  wednesday afternoon and immediately started feeling weird and felt cramps  i got tired hence  suppose to give you energy  and went to sleep when i woke up i felt rejuvenated had the best sleep i had since june it is now september  the next day i felt soreness in my nips subside a great deal  but i was sore in my neck and my butt as if i had worked out hadn t this might be a side effect   so i decided to lay off the tea for a few days until the soreness left  thursday was feeling a bit lighter so i got on the scale lost 2 lbs i weighed in at the dr  wednesday at 157 tax and was 155 00 no change  by friday once i got home from work af  very light but  it was there  one cup of tea for me  last cycle may  wipe spotting on august 28 september 3 it is september 22nd we we will see what else happens i just finished my 2nd cup  i usually don t write reviews  but with the hope this product gave me i thought i would share  p s  i dont mind the taste is it amaaazzziiinggg   absolutely not but it is ok  two days later

now you may ask why pay to have h20 packed and shipped half way around the world just to be guzzled in a mater of seconds  minutes at the most well  nothing  is the reason  everyday you hear about the odd stuff that is in local water supplies  my favorite statement is  it may look nasty and taste awful but it is perfectly safe   so we turn to bottled water that is everything from the same local water just packaged to fancy mineral water that needs lime to mellow it out  included in this category is a concoction called drinking water  they take everything out and put back what they guess makes water drinkable  the worst sort of stuff is items packed in colorful plastic bottles that taste like colorful plastic evian on the other hand is water the way that nature intended  it goes down smooth and has no after taste  it is refreshing when cooled but can work well even at room temperature  gourmet coffee locations use this as the base water because it does not distract from the taste  the water is even used externally for applying and removing makeup  i keep a case in the car incase of any emergency that may come up there is  nothing  more satisfying  nothing

but there is something strange about the packaging   my home is constantly over 76f  so it is always a liquid   when it arrived  the box was partially soaked with coconut oil   i can t find the leak and the bottle and inner seal seems to be ok   since i only use it for hair and skin care  i am keeping it the smell is really nice and not overwhelming   maybe it s the only oil available in bulk that do not put off people with the smell update  it s the same thing when my other oils arrived   they are dense   since their bottles are almost unbreakable  they packaging is normally just big air bubbles loosely around them   they experience violence forces during transit   the bottles have a pretty normal secure seal like any normal products in the supermarket   but their seal broke during individual transit   that explains the slight leaks   when fall comes  the oil turn into a beautiful solid now i understand what is a light oil   coconut oil is not   you can t apply it to your hair without using a normal shampoo to remove the greasy feeling   the strong greasy feeling that you cannot stand going to bed with it in your dry hair   you may want a thick oil for the skin though   you got instant soft skin even for hardened sole   but whether it does anything to the skin long term is another story btw  many other oils are near odourless   this oil is the exception that have a faint coconut odour to it  i like the product

my order was turned over to usps priority mail for delivery to me and  unfortunately  was apparently lost in mail handling   i was initially upset with the delay in receiving the product but  when the vendor was appraised of the contretemps  i was notified that a replacement shipment had be sent which i could expect to receive within two days the replacment shipment arrived promptly and i was pleased with the quality of the honey and its convenient packaging   i cannot hold the vendor responsible for the mis handling by the united states postal service and as far as the product itself  it was as good  or better  than any honey i have ever purchased anywhere  including honey purchased in the comb   i unhesitatingly recommend ys organic bee farms clover honey to anyone interested in an excellent organic product   i will order it again  an excellent organic honey from a producer who cares

to start i should say i hate almonds  i don t dislike them  i hate them  and i have tried all manner of almonds  from raw to various flavors   a former co worker brought a huge jug of these to work and urged me to give one a try  like the stubborn child who refuses to eat her veggies  i popped one in my mouth  with a large glass of water in hand to wash down what i expected to be the awful  to me  flavor  i was shocked to find i not only didn t object to these  but became hooked on them in short order i have been unable to find this flavor in the mega jug my co worked purchased at a big box retailer over a year ago and was pleased to find this option on amazon for a price lower than my local grogery store  i wish that big jug were available  but these smaller cans probably assure a fresher product i will add  that i am a big fan of vinegar  but am not a big fan of salt and vinegar chips  these almonds have an excellent balance of flavor  full of flavor

the product is fantastic   a lovely tasting tea that brings clarity  peace of mind  and a really positive natural energy   i would buy it regularly except for the ridiculous postage and customs charges   the postage was more than the actual product itself   27  however i do believe the tea is very reasonably priced  at around 23 for 100 tea bags  no more than any other herbal tea that you can buy at health food stores    and there s no match for coca tea     so i thought ok  i ll do it this once its worth it    and then i was hit with a further 25 customs charge that i was forced to pay or my product would be going back to sender   i was not going to let it go back when i d already paid double for it   i wasn t informed that there was a possibility of this happening  and my total charge for a 25 product now came to 75   it wasn t at any point told what the postal costs covered  what exactly was i paying for if not the ensuing customs charges  i was also not notified that my package was even being held anywhere  it just didn t show up and i had to contact the seller to ask what was going on  i was further unimpressed by the defensive attitude of the response i got  which stated that they had to pay an extremely high postage to get it to me         i m sorry but i have a hard time believing that when i d just paid 50 to get a 25 item delivered   are they telling me that it cost more than 50  that they too paid high postage prices on top of mine  i don t think so  whatever they had to pay they would have made sure they covered it with what they charged me  if i am wrong i strongly suggest they investigate the postal services that they are using for over charging as i have never heard of anything quite so unreasonable  i ve given it a high rating only because the actual tea is such a great product  but i won t be buying it here again  i don t know what other sellers are like for postage but i m disappointed with amazon   with this seller after that experience  i think people need forewarning about the charges before they make a decision to buy      great product  extortionate postage made a 25 item cost 75

i live in an urban neighborhood and i hate flies so i m starting to buy these things by the crate   everyone should use them  they work pros   i ve killed literally thousands of flies   gallons of flies  eventually i think i ll manage to wipe out the local breeding population and get ahead of the curve   trick is to start early in the spring   what one is really trying to achieve is population control not just killing a few flies   otherwise  depending on your landscape of course  the neighbors flies will just move in   bottom line if you use it according to the directions this flytrap works extremely well   many of the negative reviews here clearly didn t read the directions   it really needs to be in sunlight cons   it reeks   seriously   i can t imagine anyone using this inside their house   when it gets going you don t really want to be within 20 feet of it   unbelievably strong smell of rotting garbage  and though it s theoretically reusable  you are unlikely to do so unless you have a really strong stomach   think a big jar of rotting dead and half dead flies   it s really foul bottom line  if you use it properly   think some form of perimeter defense  with targeting of fly hot spots like garbage cans with loose lids  you can make your world fly free   if you have really few flies  one jar properly located will take care of them  but you should actually spend some time analyzing what you need anecdotally and by observation  btw  this seems like the most effective fly trap on the market works very well

any instant isn t as good as the real thing  but for instant  nongshim makes a decent group of instant noodles  this is probably the best kimchi instant noodles out there  avoid paldo  that is total garbage  add an egg to this to really add some flavor  but be warned  it may make the soup a little bland  add a tiny bit of kimchi juice to it  to spice it up remember    do not overcook the noodles  it is disgusting if you overcook the noodles  the noodles cook in the hot broth anyway  so turn off stove early on  and don t add too much water of you will get bland soup  and don t let soup evaporate too much  or you will get salty soup  it s all about balance     good luck update  yup  you gotta microwave it  otherwise  it s gross  i know  you smarties are probably laughing your donkeys off     i ve revised it to 5 stars  it s pretty good  but let it cool off for 3 mins  you ll burn your mouth off  if you try it while  hot   soup is spot on  noodles are pretty decent  best kimchi noodles there is   updated

i made the mistake of putting too much milk in the jar the first time i made kefir with these grains  old habit  but thought  what the heck  it won t hurt the grains  in 24 hours i strained the milk out of the grains and added just less than a pint  about 12 ounces  of milk to them the second time  i drank the slightly soured milk from the first batch  not bad  within 24 hours that short pint had turned into the thickest  smoothest  yummiest kefir ever  i ve made 2 more batches since and the last one was with 3 cups of milk  absolutely perfect  i m convinced that my next batch will do a full quart  highly recommend this product ps  i use a low heat pasteurized milk  i would not recommend using regular pasteurized milk and absolutely do not use ultra pasteurized milk  raw milk will work but only for the first and maybe second batch as the wild bacteria in the raw milk compete with the kefir grains  if you use raw milk then always let your kefir grains renew themselves in some pasteurized milk  best homemade kefir yet

let me start by saying i m a very cheap person and for the past 4 years have only give my cats friskees wet food  i actually did splurge and get them royal canin sensitive stomach as dry food though  in my defense  and that stuff isn t cheap  however  in the past few months  my older cat started licking all the hair off of her stomach and was scratching constantly  two trips to the vet and two steroid injections later  everything was ruled out but an allergic reaction to either the litter i was using  arm   hammer  or the food  to avoid paying more vet bills and to make my little fur baby happy  i decided to man woman  up and get the good stuff  you know  the stuff with no disgusting animal by products  rice  grain  and brewer s yeast in it  i never really took the time to read the back of the friskee s label or the label of the royal canin  you think if you pay a lot for something it will be healthy  but it s not  i feel like such a bad parent in any event i completely switched everything  started using pine pellets for the litter  which is all natural  and got this core brand food because it appeared to be exactly what my cats needed  something completely free of anything bad for them  i was also instructed by my vet not to feed them chicken or beef because a lot of allergies come from that  so i have only purchased the turkey duck seafood types of core food  both wet and dry summary of the wet  yeah  it s almost  2 00 a can  makes you a little ill thinking about it  but i ve never seen my cats literally lick the entire plate clean and want more than two servings in a day of anything  when i fed them friskee s i was easily throwing away half a can a day just by having it be left over and stale on their plate  not with this core food  they devour it and come back for more  it s amazing  my wallet doesn t thank me but those cats sure do as for the dry food  it s a little different in shape texture than other dry foods  they eat it  but i think they like the wet better  i leave out dry food during the day in case they get hungry so i know they are eating it  but they much prefer the wet my animals eat better than i do and get better medical care than i do   sigh  my cats actually lick the plate clean  woah

at the age of 30 i developed severe hormonal acne mainly on my cheeks  chin  and upper lip area  i went to a dermatologist who said this is  normal  for women my age with a hormonal imbalance    acne tends to develop around the areas that men get facial hair  she wanted me to take birth control  some other hormonal pill  and use 2 facial creams instead i found this tea  now keep in mind i d been dealing with this acne for 2 years and it continued to get progressively worse  i was up to 2 or 3 new zits a day  i started to drink only one cup of this a day and within a month i noticed a significant difference  after 2 months the breakouts stopped altogether  if i stop drinking the tea the breakouts return within a week or so and i have to start the process all over  learned that the hard way    twice  so i ll just continue to drink the tea    i never had any cycle imbalance problems and i still don t  i chose to write this review because the acne had been taking a toll on my overall self esteem and i was getting to the point that i hated going to work    or leaving the house for that matter  i d never had acne before in my life  this tea has been a blessing and is just part of my daily routine now  the scars have healed and i do not get breakouts anymore i never took what the doctor prescribed for me  so yes i m sure the tea is what s doing the trick  and like i said    when i stop drinking it the breakouts start back up  if i skip a day or two it doesn t seem to have an affect  i drink the red raspberry leaf tea with it i really hope this review helps someone else  if it does    please comment to let me know  thanks  cures my adult hormonal acne

i thought the raccoon problem was never going to go away  they re smart   dexterous  and strew my trash all over the place  in desperation i skeptically sprinkled this around the trash container area and couldn t believe it when the next day i had no problems  or the next  or the next  it said it would last about a month before re applying  and it did it worked so well that after a month  i d almost forgotten about the problem  when it must have worn off   trash messes began reappearing and it needed a fresh dose  reapplying kept them away again i do treat the product with care  but really have no worries  once it s been down a short while  you don t know it s there but the animals do  it sounds like it isn t cruel  either  as it simply irritates their eyes making them want to keep away my area is about 8 x 8  feet   and the perimeter is all i treat  the one container will treat my area at least four times if you have animal problems  give it a try  i can t believe it

this product is designed to keep away pests   small pests  when they dig and ruin gardens   i originally wanted this for use around the perimeter of my vegetable garden  but it is not for use near food plants i have had only a few problems in other areas of my yard which i could test this on  but the problems are not as bothersome as they are with the vegetable garden i have tested it around flowers and garbage areas  we live in a rural area  and so far nothing has touched those areas for 30 days   we have not had a lot of rain  so i can not comment on how long it lasts during rainy seasons so far  nothing seems to be bothering those two areas  but again  the real problem areas are my vegetable garden so i wish i could have tested it on those areas   but at least i have it for the garbage area in the winter  and the other areas which seem to attract the little pests i will update with any further input as i continue to use this  seems to be working

we love the molasses      had a problem with original shipment not arriving safely  but a reshipment arrived safely and intact  i ordered 3 bottles of the molasses in july and the 3 bottles arrived but two bottles were damaged in shipment by amazon who did not put packing material in with the glass bottles   i wrote a bad review i received a message from jennie at the company who produces the molasses    she shipped out at no additional cost to us three new bottles    they were plastic bottles this time  not glass   jennie from the family owned company followed up with me several times with very nice emails the plastic bottles arrived in tact with no problems   i really appreciated the quick and positive response from the company that produces the molasses i will order the molasses again from this company    i would have deleted my original review  but could not access it and do so   so writing a new review dr  donna moss quick response from molasses company    recommend highly    reneg on previous review

i purchased this gum after an exhaustive search for sugar free gum that didn t contain aspartame  which is an additive that is bad for people with sensitive gi tracts  and may have other negative health consequences   almost all gums contain aspartame and it s very difficult to find a product that doesn t this gum met all the basic criteria i needed  i tried a few other brands that didn t contain aspartame including glee gum triple berry  18 piece boxes  pack of 12    between was the best  primarily because the taste lasted and the gum doesn t harden after a few minutes of chewing  granted  the flavor of this gum won t last as long as standard commercial gum found at the grocery store  but that s the tradeoff for purchasing a more healthy product as a  healthy  gum product  between gets 5 stars  even as judged by commercial gum standards  flavor  longevity  etc    this product would get 4 stars  good sugarfree option w o unhealthy additives

this is rare find in gluten free cookies when it comes to flavor and texture   unfortunately rice based products tend to crumble and these cookies are no exception   mine were purchased locally and one third were broken   it is possible that better packing would reduce breakage as the current packing does not restrict movement of the cookies  worse  this packing does nothing to distribute g forces evenly across each cookie when the box is dropped   old style cookie tins have crinkled paper cups and shock absorbing corrugated cardboard   pamela needs to take advantage of our ever expanding knowledge of the physics of how things break   put another way  pamela s package is like a car with no seat belts  no airbags  no safety cage and no crumple zone  additional cost would be small in my opinion rice cookies made with honey or molasses hold up better as these sticky sweeteners have gluten s glue like binding power   it may not be possible to make shortbread cookies more durable while maintaining the excellent taste i cannot eat real shortbread so breakage is better than nothing  an excellent corn and gluten free cookie that does not hold up in shipment

i completely agree with some of the other reviewers here  i ordered mine along with several other items at the same time and didn t realize how poorly they were going to be packaged until i got my box with 2 of the 3 umeboshi paste packages damaged and leaking everywhere  amazon shipped this delicate item in a large box along with over 4 pounds of backing flours  what was the thinking amazon     thankfully  they refunded me entirely for the damaged products which had to be thrown out for fear of contamination from other items in the box  next time though  i will definitely not have these shipped with anything else since this is a review of the product  i will say that the product itself is very good and very useful in a lot of vegan gluten free baking  this is all i ever use it for anyway and a little goes a long way  do not have this shipped with heavy items

they are oats  wheat  rye  and barley  in other words  they do seed if allowed to mature before getting killed by cats  since i do have a backyard with space to plant  i plant seeds in soil  it takes about 4 months to complete their life cycle  during their growth  i only pick off tips of the leaves so they could still continue to grow  only the last few days of seed maturing the leaves turn dry and yellow and are not edible  in return  i could get seeds  for free  to plant right away  as long as the weather allows it i don t use any pest control or use any fertilizer  so certainly not all of the seeds would survive  aphids  with the help of ants  and snails do invade  and a slight strong gust could break their fragile stems  however  i could be sure that they are certainly organic through out the process  and the source of grass would not die down during the months they grow notes  remember to wash before feeding to cats  and certainly don t pick off parts that had been bitten by aphids or crawled by snails  this is how i plant them

these noodles have no calories  quite a bit is written about how terrible they smell  frankly  it is true  however  it is easily dealt with  i open up the bag  drain the noodles in a strainer  and continue to soak the noodles in warm water from the tap for some 30 minutes or so  they are great for use in soups  they also work well in any situation where there will be a strongly flavored sauce  they do not tend to take up the taste of the sauce they are cooked in  to be quite honest  if i had a choice between these and the regular vietnamese rice noodle i would certainly eat the regular vietnamese noodle however the calories and carbohydrates are not workable for me  the fact that these have insignificant calories and carbohydrates trumps any minor problems i have with taste and texture you should be aware that these are available from local stores for quite a bit less  i bought 20 bags of these yesterday from my local asian store in a small to medium town for 2 dollars and 15 cents per bag  great product  terrible price

i work at a grocery store and we just barely started carrying the blk water   after seeing several people buying it the past couple weeks  i decided i had to get one and try it   i was totally expecting it to have some kind of bitter taste or something just because of how black the water was   i have to say though  it doesn t taste bad at all  it tastes just like tap water   it has a very slight metallic taste to it if you try to pick a flavor out  but other than that it s not anymore noticeable than the water you get out of the faucet  and we have pretty good water in our city    i don t know what kind of water these other reviewers were drinking because their descriptions of how awful and nasty the blk water is are way exaggerated   i think they were going for more of a shock factor than being realistic  doesn t taste bad at all   these other people are crazy

length   2 25 minsthey are oats  wheat  rye  and barley  in other words  they do seed if allowed to mature before getting killed by cats  since i do have a backyard with space to plant  i plant seeds in soil  it takes about 4 months to complete their life cycle  during their growth  i only pick off tips of the leaves so they could still continue to grow  only the last few days of seed maturing the leaves turn dry and yellow and are not edible  in return  i could get seeds  for free  to plant right away  as long as the weather allows it i don t use any pest control or use any fertilizer  so certainly not all of the seeds would survive  aphids  with the help of ants  and snails do invade  and a slight strong gust could break their fragile stems  however  i could be sure that they are certainly organic through out the process  and the source of grass would not die down during the months they grow in the end  the wood container becomes cat treat bag holder  anyhow  my russian blue is very rough at biting grass  so planting inside the box had been countless flip overs and soil spills notes  if planting outside  remember to wash before feeding to cats  and certainly don t pick off parts that had been bitten by aphids or crawled by snails  this is how i plant them

the 46 oz canned roland grapefruit sections taste almost like fresh  very good product  i would like to order more  but the packaging was absolutely horrible     there were cans rolling around in a box much too large for the number of cans and there was virtually no packing material in the box   the result was that out of 8 or so cans in the box 7 out of the 8 were so bent on both ends that you cannot use a can opener to completely remove the lid without a lot of stops and starts   where the item says the product is in a 4 pack  they are not in a box containing the 4 pack   what they actually mean is that 4 46 oz cans are inserted into a light weight plastic bag and then thrown into a large box that would easily hold 24 cans and is too light weight to support the weight of the cans  then throw in a little packing and put 1 piece of tape on the top  the tape was actually broken on a box with nothing to hold the cans in the box and because of the rolling around in the box  the cans were no longer in the plastic bag   very good product that you cannot find elsewhere  but beware of the packing  good product   bad shipment packaging

on sept 12 i posted the following seller review   3 5 stars    i m sorry to say that this item arrived with some slight cosmetic damage  on the top front edge of the rack there is what i would call a dent  but it s also rough  from the way it was packaged i would have to say that it was that way when it was put into the box  i intended this as a gift  and i don t have time to return it  so i ll just try to sand it down so it s at least smooth    jammies  september 12  2012later amazon added   message from amazon   this item was fulfilled by amazon  and we take responsibility for this fulfillment experience  shortly after i posted it  i received an email from the spice lab inc  offering to send a new block  i sent them a couple of pictures of the damaged area  they sent me a new block and two little spoons to replace the one that was missing from my original order  the replacement block arrived yesterday in plenty of time for my trip to visit my son and daughter in law in hindsight  i should have contacted the spice lab before i posted the review  so they could have had time to resolve the problem  i had jumped to the conclusion that i d need to return the item in order to get a replacement  which wasn t the case since it s a gift  i can t speak to the quality of the salt  but i can say that the block is very sturdy and attractive  and the little spoon is a charming addition i greatly appreciate the efforts of brett at the spice lab  and i would happily buy from them again  review correction

this is my second box of these creamers   the first ones  ordered about 9 months ago  were great and did not cause me any gastrointestinal discomfort   but after receiving this latest shipment a few weeks ago and after a couple days of having my morning coffee with two of these creamers  i noticed that i was having pronounced symptoms of having ingested dairy   i guess it was my mistake in thinking that all coffee mate products were non dairy   i looked again at the label on these and it plainly says  contains milk ingredients   so even though the product description says  lactose free   it isn t   i can t understand why the last box of these didn t bother me   maybe something changed with the formulation   but i won t be ordering these anymore   i m still giving the product 4 stars because it s a good creamer if you can tolerate dairy   but if i could tolerate dairy i would ve just bought creamers at the grocery store    lactose intolerant folks  beware

i read some of the reviews on here and i almost didn t purchase   but i reached a point where due to my erratic work schedule  trying to fit in my studying time and completing assignments  my sleep pattern was disrupted and it was affecting my mood and concentration   so i bit the bullet and purchased this at a local b m store   when i got home after work  i boiled some water and opened the package   i noticed that this tea was packaged in a plastic bag so i guess it did has a pungent smell   i opened the plastic bag and took a big whiff   i was kind of disappointed   it doesn t smell as bad as some of the other reviewers made it out to me but then again my nose has been wonky for some time so it could be me   yes i will admit that it does has a funky odor but it is not that strong to me   to me  smells like this health food store i used to frequent in the hyde park neighborhood   very musky but weirdly comforting   i have tried it with peppermint  turmeric  for a different affliction  and i have tried it plain with stevia and it taste okay to me   i wouldn t say i have an iron stomach because i can easily get sick if food is left out in the open not at the proper temperature   for me  this product took about two days for it to kick in and i am now able to sleep for a full eight hours straight instead of sleeping in fits of four hours here  wake up for about two hours  sleep for three  wake up for a hour and sleep for another four hours   for those with sensitive noses and sense of taste  you have been amply warned by other reviewers   for others  i say give it a shot or at least pair it with some other teas to dilute the taste a bit   there are some great suggestions mentioned by other reviewers  like mint for example  it works for me and that is all i care about

i accidentally bought this smaller size  but it s actually better for milk because you have to use what you thaw   so filling up the 8 oz milk bag and you have a lot of milk for baby   i ve been freezing and thawing and have used about 20 of these bags so far and no leaks or holes   freeze them flat then stack them together   be careful the condensation may case bags to freeze together   even so  i ve found that pulling them apart has not created any leaks  these 4 oz bags are better size for milk than the larger bags

after learning about kopi luwak from the bucket list  i ve been wanting to try some but never could bring myself to try it due to the cost and the fact that it s been in and out of an animal   but when i found a friend who was willing to try it with me  i figured  how bad could this be   granted  this was an expensive experiment but it s a once thing so the  50 was well spent in that sense we both like strong coffee and this was certainly strong   a 100gm bag was more than enough for a 10 cup pot with some leftover   it didn t smell any different nor did it taste any different  unfortunately    mind you  i m not comparing this to stuff like folgers or starbucks   i m comparing it to the malaysian coffee i m used to    it was strong but smooth   it didn t have the  rancid  taste  not sure if i m explaining the taste correctly  that some cheaper coffee tend to have and neither did it have a charred flavor like burnt beans   unfortunately  it still had a hint of bitterness toward the end of the sip   i tried it black at first to experience the taste unadulterated by anything but couldn t stand it    i never could drink black coffee anyway    a packet of sugar made it pleasant but still retain its coffee ness as an experiment  it was worth it  albeit a little expensive   i don t think i ll be purchasing more of this   it s an ok coffee   i would drink it if presented with it but i won t go out of my way to get it   just a little too expensive for everyday drinking   i ll stick to my malaysian coffee   sweet  smooth  and buttery  almost  smooth but a little too expensive for everyday consumption

this tastes lovely in terms of spices  but there is absolutely no pumpkin to this  it isn t sweet  either  i currently am mixing this syrup with some sugar free vanilla i picked up today and that is making it better     but still not what i expected  i would still be willing to try other flavors  though  someone said it tastes like those red hot cinnamon candies  that seems very accurate  only not as intense as mentioned in another review  mine didn t have any kind of seal on it other than the twist off cap  but it did sound sealed  so i suppose it is safe good thing  it came with a pump i would say this is likely best used in tandem with either a basic sweetener vanilla pumpkin pie syrup because this by itself isn t what you re looking for    edit 22 september 2012     upgrade from 2 to 4 starsas another reviewer mentioned  the next business day after i made this review i got a phone call from paul  owner of amoretti  we talked about their products  the syrups in particular of course  apparently people either love or hate this one  not much in between  he made the point that none of the syrups are very sweet or sugary  which is what led me to buy this instead of pumpkin pie  worrying it would be too sweet  and don t even use artificial sweeteners  he asked if he could send me the pumpkin pie flavor and some other goodies  which i felt bad for accepting  but i am glad i did he sent  overnight  three full size bottles of syrups  pumpkin pie  violet lavender  and crema di vanilla   a mini sampler of their three olive oils  and two samplers of martini mixes absolutely astounding customer service  just     i am still gobsmacked  if i could rate just the company from 1 5 stars  i d give them a 20 i have used the pumpkin spice a few more times since i wrote the original review above and still am not a big fan of it  though i think i can definitely find some uses for it  it seems like it would be best not as a base flavoring  if that makes sense  but to use more like a quarter to half a pump at the very most to add just a touch more spice to a drink all the syrups are quite concentrated  so that doesn t necessarily work in favor of a spice flavor  because you think oh  it needs more sweetness  i ll add more  do not do that  it will make it taste terrible  definitely stick with the reccommendations of how much to use in a hot or cold drink on the back of the bottle  each pump of syrup has 4g of sugar so adding more syrup isn t going to help  that was  admittedly  a mistake i had made with the pumpkin spice also  for either the pumpkin pie or the pumpkin spice  consider getting the crema di vanilla and putting a quarter to half a pump in your drink  it s like putting the whipped cream on your pumpkin pie  absolutely amazing i may update this again if i can find a way to truly enjoy the pumpkin spice flavor  but everything else seems amazing and you cannot find better customer service anywhere  they really take your input into consideration and want feedback  this brand is definitely worth the money thank you  paul  never buying another brand  again  all spice  no pumpkin

this review is mostly about installation issues   the target is a raccoon who s been laying waste to my small pond the included fence posts  just plastic stakes  are a problem if you have to drive them through anything but the softest dirt   i had better luck using 3 4 inch schedule 40 plastic pipe  cutting several lengths about six inches to a foot long  and driving the pipe sections into the dirt until only about an inch or so sticks out   once this is done  the pre drilled plastic stake drops neatly into the pipe end   you might have to use a hose to flush some dirt out of the inside of the plastic pipe this also makes it easy to remove small installations around a garden or pond or something  since once you ve discouraged the animal you can just lift the stakes out of the pipes  roll everything up  and put it away until you need it again the box that generates the voltage is not weatherproof  which would have been nice  but i expect it would have added to the price   unless you have a sheltered area right near your installation  you ll need an electrical outdoor junction box or something to protect that box   my junction box cost about 35 bucks  a wiegmann 8x8x4 outdoor enclosure i m going to add an on off switch in its own enclosure box  and a photocell to turn the thing off when daylight comes   i don t trust myself to remember to disconnect it every morning  and i ve got nothing against squirrels  good product for the price   some installation issues

my dog ate this food from the time we adopted her until shortly before we moved to a town where i couldn t purchase it locally   about 6 years  so i switched her to wellness  that went well for about eight months and then our dog developed bouts of diarrhea that lasted for weeks  at that point  i switched her to yet another wellness formula and we got another seven months before the diarrhea came back  i tried to switch her to yet another formula of wellness  but couldn t even complete the transition without the diarrhea coming back  a light bulb went off at that point and i looked on amazon for halo spots stew  nowadays it can be purchased with free shipping  i never would have switched if that was available when we moved   she s been on the chicken spots stew for many months now without any digestive issues whatsoever   the whole family is much happier and healthier because of halo  this is the one

i read some of the reviews on here and i almost didn t purchase   but i reached a point where due to my erratic work schedule  trying to fit in my studying time and completing assignments  my sleep pattern was disrupted and it was affecting my mood and concentration   so i bit the bullet and purchased this at a local b m store   when i got home after work  i boiled some water and opened the package   i noticed that this tea was packaged in a plastic bag so i guess it did has a pungent smell   i opened the plastic bag and took a big whiff   i was kind of disappointed   it doesn t smell as bad as some of the other reviewers made it out to me but then again my nose has been wonky for some time so it could be me   yes i will admit that it does has a funky odor but it is not that strong to me   to me  smells like this health food store i used to frequent in the hyde park neighborhood   very musky but weirdly comforting   i have tried it with peppermint  turmeric  for a different affliction  and i have tried it plain with stevia and it taste okay to me   i wouldn t say i have an iron stomach because i can easily get sick if food is left out in the open not at the proper temperature   for me  this product took about two days for it to kick in and i am now able to sleep for a full eight hours straight instead of sleeping in fits of four hours here  wake up for about two hours  sleep for three  wake up for a hour and sleep for another four hours   for those with sensitive noses and sense of taste  you have been amply warned by other reviewers   for others  i say give it a shot or at least pair it with some other teas to dilute the taste a bit   for example  mints like peppermint or spearmint will help   some folks will use lavender to mask the smell  yes it does have an odor that some will find disagreeable  but it works for me and i will continue to purchase it

grocery stores  overpriced  lacking quality  lacking flavor  lacking potency  just plain lacking celestial seasonings   2 5  several varieties available at most grocery stores  overpriced  low quality green tea with pleasant side flavors  lacking potency bentley s   3 0  really hard to find  usually overpriced  medium quality green tea  slightly bitter overpowering the side flavors  would be a 4 0 but it is not 100  natural yogi   3 5  several varieties available  pricey  medium quality green tea with noticeably pleasant side flavors tazo   4 0  kind of hard to find locally  pricey  medium quality green tea with extremely pleasant side flavors healing teas of the world   4 0  hard to find locally  fair price  100  natural  high quality pure green tea with strong but pleasant side flavors kirkland   4 5  available at costco  great price  100  natural  high quality pure green tea  best tasting earthy flavor with tiny hint of sweetness  slightly lacking in potency or i would give i concur with the majority of the reviews here  my dog seems to quite like this food  it feels a bit moist  looks somewhat colorful  and even smells a bit of beef  in other words  it certainly comes across as good quality dog food  however  it s worth noting that the ingredients seem to be somewhat of a mixed bag beef is the most prevalent ingredient  which indicates a slightly higher quality of product  look at the labels of many other bags of dog food  and you ll see that the first ingredient is usually some filler    unfortunately  fillers seem to take up several of the succeeding slots on the ingredients list of this chef michael s product  so it s certainly not the highest quality you ll find  but it s definitely not the worst either bottom line  my guess is that it seems to be a bit higher quality than your average bag of dog food  and that makes it a bargain for the price  you could do better if you re willing to pay for it  but i think this food will do well for most dog owners  it will certainly do for most

first of all i am giving this 5 stars because it is a pretty good tasting soup  but this soup is not for vegans  some of you commented that this was vegan  but it is not  here are the ingredients  taken from progresso com  water  potatoes  tomato puree  water  tomato paste   tomatoes  carrots  celery  corn  dark red kidney beans  green beans  onions  contains less than 2  of  modified food starch  sugar  celery juice concentrate  sea salt  potassium chloride  onion powder  garlic powder  dextrose  corn protein  hydrolyzed   salt  citric acid  natural flavor  yeast extract  dried parsley  spice  beet powder  color   calcium chloride  carrot juice concentrate  onion juice  bell pepper juice concentrate  sodium phosphate  corn syrup  egg yolk powder  soy lecithin  caramel color  milk  freshness preserved by potassium sorbate progresso makes no claim that this soup is vegan  amazon should have provided the list of ingredients  but they didn t  so  if you re vegetarian or eat meat  you re fine  if you re vegan  like me  since august 3  2012   look elsewhere  it s too bad that progresso insists on adding eggs and dairy to their vegetable soups  my favorite was the low sodium minestrone  but it also has egg and dairy products  good for vegetarians   omnivores  not for vegans

i have been drinking filtered water for many years  ever since i was young i remember growing up drinking distilled water because my uncle had sold my parents a distiller  since then i have learned that the mineral content of the water is very important and also lends to a more smooth and refreshing drink  if any of you have tasted distilled water then you know what i mean when i moved out and purchased my own house  i installed an r o  filter under my kitchen sink and drank r o  water for several years  r o  water like distilled water has had most of the minerals removed during the filtration process  my local tap water has a ph of about 7 6 and a tds  total dissolved solids  average of about 356 ms  my own r o  water brought the conductivity down to around 30 ms and the ph to around 7 or slightly less   i currently use my ro filter along with a de ionizing filter afterwards to create ultra pure 0 ms tds water for my reef tank  i do not drink it i was introduced to  kangen  or  ionized alkaline water  while i was traveling in japan  it is water that has been filtered  usually thru a sediment  then a carbon block cartridge  and then run past energized platinum plates to create 2 water streams  one stream is acidic and one is alkaline  the acid water can be used to clean  water plants and put topically on the skin amongst its many uses  the alkaline water is what you drink  apparently during the ionizing process the water molecules are also altered  usually water clusters together in 12 or so molecule clusters  while ionized water has smaller clusters of around 6 8 molecules  supposedly this allows the water to cross the cell membranes in our bodies easier and promotes more rapid rehydration despite all the theories and studies  the real evidence for me is the way the water works for me  before drinking alkaline water i would get heartburn or acid reflux occasionally after a long day of hard work or after eating certain foods  after several months of drinking alkaline water i never got acid reflux  three years later since i first started drinking alkaline water i have only had acid reflux maybe twice  i would attribute that to the foods i ate that day and stressful work as well as not drinking the filtered water for several days prior  alkaline water has improved my health in my opinion and am still drinking and prefer it to any other drinks when i am thirsty  it hasn t however kept me from getting sick occasionally or making me look many years younger  it has overall generally improved my health and i do feel better drinking it on a daily basis since i own a several thousand dollar alkaline water ionizer filter and drink the water daily  own an r o  filter and water testing equipment and understand a moderate amount of water chemistry principles  i was very curious to try this bottled version of alkaline water and see how it compares it states on the label that the water has been r o  filtered  then minerals have been added back  it lists sodium bicarbonate  dipotassium phosphate  magnesium sulfate and calcium chloride  after the minerals have been added back then it is  alkalized and restructured using ionic separation technology  all of this sounds very familiar as this is exactly how alkaline water ionizers work  the water needs to have minerals added back to be able to ionize the water  here is what i discovered after trying a bottle taste  i like the taste of it  it s not bad  it s light and refreshing and very similar to my own alkaline water smell  clean  no noticeable  off  odors hydration ability  better than tap  but   nano clustered  water supposedly looses its smaller clustering formation over time measured in days  i wonder if the water is still structured the same by the time it gets to us to drink  didn t seem to refresh quite as well as freshly made alkaline water ph  label states a ph of 9 5 which is on par with my ionizer unit which can produce a range of ph strengths from 7 0 to 12 0 i usually drink alkaline water with a ph of 9 overall i like the water and would choose it first over any other bottled water at the connivence store  its benefits would be the fact that it is filtered  has a proper mineral content  unlike distilled and ro water only   and has an alkaline ph  it s limitations to me seem to be the age of it thus potentially losing its small water clustering  as well as the plastic bottle is comes in  many alkaline water aficionados recommend using glass containers first  stainless steel second and bpa free plastic third as the hierarchy of best water vessels to use  while not providing all the benefits of freshly made alkaline ionized water  it does provide a good many of them  currently a 12 pack of 1 5l bottles on amazon cost  28 75 and this translates to roughly  0 80 per 16 oz of water  which is not bad compared to  1 25 16 oz bottles at my local store  i think the 1 5 liter is a good size and a good quantity of water to drink per day of this water for most people  that amount to  2 40 per 1 5l bottle  i make my own for pennies on the dollar  but when including the initial investment of purchasing the ionizer along with replacement filter costs  buying these bottles will be cheaper for a long payback period  however if getting the absolute full benefits of alkaline ionized water is very important  you may want to consider purchasing an ionizing unit  these also would be a good way to test drinking this type of water before purchasing your own unit  in conclusion i think essentia water is making a very good attempt to bring the benefits of alkaline ionized water to more people and i would purchase it over any other bottled waters  all water is not the same imo

my dog loves these rawhide bones  he s a black lab mix and it takes him a an hour and a half of pure chewing to get through one  you can tell that the bones are quality rawhide and thoroughly pressed  always a plus  the only thing i didn t like was that each bone had a tag  a small issue  but only takes two seconds to take all of them off   just silly to waste paper i guess  in total  these bones are worth it and will not break into little pieces on the floor  i will certainly buy these again in the future  love compressed rawhide

1am  downtown going away house party  i ve been here for hours and i m starting to lose energy but the fun is only just starting   what to do     so i drank a 5 hour energy and never gave my tiredness a second thought  i felt naturally alert and energized like the night had just began  if i had chosen an energy drink instead  i would have felt jittery and bloated due to the carbonation in the drink  just a little sip is all i needed  i would definitely buy this again   fyi  i also snacked on a banana at the same time   i think the two together really gave me the shot of energy so i would suggest hungry 5 hour energy fans to try this healthy snack along with the drink i received a free sample of 5 hour energy from smiley360  best tasting one yet

i purchased the 12  bully sticks  7 pack  from downtown pet supply about a week ago   one of my two dogs recently passed away  and the other was feeling a little depressed   i wanted to give her a  special treat   but also hoped that these would help perk up her poor appetite since her sister s passing   boy have these done the trick   i let her chew on the stick for about 30 minutes   then took it away   low and behold  she remembered she was hungry and ate all of her food   she is a 50lb lab mix who is very healthy at 13 5 years old   in the past i had purchased 6  bully sticks at a local pet supply store for  5 each   these sticks come out to be just under  3 50 stick and are twice the size   this purchase was well worth it    quality product for a great price   i will re order again   thank you  excellent quality bully sticks

before i purchased this product  i have heard that fox s glacier fruits are amazing in that they contain only real fruit juices  frankly  i thought that this was just an ad designed to entice buyers  but when i ordered it and had a piece of fruit glacier myself  i can certainly understand why so many people are looking for it and raving about it  unlike other fruit candies whose  fruit juice  is only about 001  and the rest are just fructose corn syrup  fox s glacier fruits use fruit juice concentrates   as you put one in your mouth  you can certainly taste the wonderful flavors of lemon  strawberry  etc compared to the other candies flavored with  unnatural flavor   that mimics the taste of fruits  try one and see for yourself  yummy glacier fruits

a      i have been using click espresso protein drink with pb2 for over a week now   before purchasing i had been using another whey protein powder that was not very tasty  but none of them ever are  they are just a recovery drink for after i run  so  i was curious to see if this one would be any different as so many were saying they are right  it has a wonderful strong coffee taste  not bitter  no aftertaste and i had no problems with mixing it in the click shaker that i purchased with this   i like the size of the click shaker  its small   measures easily   my other shaker for the health food store is too big  i m not sure why others say it doesn t mix well  since i had no problems   i did try to put it in my coffee to see how it would taste   it was a no go  it did not mix in hot coffee very well  but then again  that s not what it s meant for  i do use room temp bottled water when mixing  as i am a freak of nature   do not care for cold water  but  for the review  i chilled after mixing   it stayed mixed up and maintained it s great flavor  if you add pb2 expected very small  nutty  residue to remain from the pb2 and not from the click  this is not an issue  just worth mentioning energy rush is not so prevalent for me  but i can see where someone could be speeded up with this drink  so if you high blood pressure i do not recommend this  i do not recommend this for kids or teens because of that fact  i just like the good coffee taste in my protein drink  i do recommend the pb2 for a healthy additive to this protein drink as well  click espresso protein drink

bottled water to me always seemed like a gimmick   i grew up on tap water  unfiltered  straight from the hose or sink  and didn t mind it at all   as i grew older i wanted the mineral taste to the water that you find in tap water  and spring water just seemed so bland and boring that the only time i ever actually liked drinking it was when i had run a marathon and was exhausted and any water would do   even now i bring bottled water to work  quickly finish it  and then drink tap water for the rest of the day   i don t understand why people bring gallons of bottled water to work or the gym  or bring 4 16 oz  bottled water with them   made no sense with essentia i think i may have been turned   maybe it is the ph balance  but whatever they did to the water i absolutely love   crisp and fresh tasting  more so than normal bottled water   i can see myself purchasing this and keeping it stocked   they do come in rather large size bottles   the one i had was 1 5 liters  but you receive 12 of them for around  28  which comes to a comparison shop of a little under a  1 per 16 oz  bottle   from someone who doesn t like bottled water  i did enjoy this one quite a bit 5 stars  from someone who doesn t like bottled water  i enjoyed essentia quite a bit

our son  since he was born  has had really tough problems with gerd  spit up  etc   it s made the little guy pretty miserable   his doctor suggested that we switch to a formula especially designed to address spit up issues   although he says  and i m sure he s right  that similac and enfamil are basically identical  and interchangeable  at least in our household they re not   my son will not drink enfamil at all  but is perfectly happy with the similac   we had no trouble switching from similac advance to this formulation  he sucked it right down  unlike the enfamil  which  even when he was really hungry  he refused to eat and  not only does he eat it  it works   we were really surprised at how much of a difference it made  and how quickly   he did have some difficulty at first  because he d gotten used to eating so much more formula  he spit up so much before  that a lot of his eating was playing  catch up    so we had a few  i ate too much  episodes  but then he started feeling much better and settled into a more predictable eating pattern   he still does spit up  but it s nowhere near as bad as it was   he used to have these fountains of vomit  and now it s just the occasional  small  vomit bubble  it really works

i ordered jasmine sambac  belle of india  from thai greenhouse on september 14  2012 and it arrived 4 days later on september 18 the jasmine arrived in good condition  with the soil and rootball bound in plastic wrap and the leaves wrapped in newspaper  along with foam peanuts the receipt indicates that i am to get a plant of blooming age  at 6  8  tall my plant is actually about 14  tall   it has one woody stem with a few branches  holding about 36 leaves and showing new growth  but no flower buds   it is a fine and healthy plant    as of this writing in september of 2012  hirt s gardens also offers the same plant at about the same price   however  hirt s  belle of india  is larger and has flowers   the one i received from hirt s is a  full  plant  with many more leaves and stems   plus  it has 13 buds or little white scented flowers   it comes in a 6  plastic container   so hirt s has  more plant  for about the same price   for more details  please see  arabian tea jasmine plant   belle of india   sambac   6  pot  from hirt s gardens    here are directions which i pulled from the internet 1  jasmines flower on new wood so prune to encourage new growth 2  minimum temperature for  belle of india  is 60 degrees f 3  loves warm temperatures and needs full sun  not partial  for flowering 4  fertilize lightly for more flowers  do not over fertilize  jasmine sambac  belle of india

i put a line of this stuff around my yard  it covered the half of my yard  going down border  that i have problems with neighbor dogs    the stuff is easy to pour and you can easily walk around and sprinkle the stuff around   i have not seen any animals in my yard  main concern is dogs   and when i see dogs running around i do not see them coming into my yard   my only thing to note  is that dogs seem to hate this stuff   we put it around our yard  and dogs in a nearby fence  about 10 feet away   started growling and barking and baring there teeth as we put the stuff around   so be careful if you do it near a dog  as they seem to get very violent toward you when you have this stuff out in the end this seems to work and covers a pretty good amount of coverage  however  dogs seem to hate it so hopefully that will mean they will stay away and out of my yard  seems to work

crunchy carrots contain   organic carrot  organic maltodextrin and lecithin hearty sweet potatoes contain   organic sweet potatoes  organic maltodextrin  organic corn starch  sunflower lecithin plump peas and crunchy apples contain   100  peas and 100  apples the peas and the apples were the first products i tried from this company   the baby loved them and i loved the ingredients   i thought i would try the other products so i ordered the carrots and sweet potatoes   to my surprise and disappoinment  when they arrived  i saw that they contained ingredients that i was not pleased with   i wrote nurturme and asked why they put maltodextrin in their products unnecessarily and they responded  the organic maltodexrin in our products is derived form organic corn   maltodextrins are manufactured form starch and are extensively used as an emulsifier in foods they are included in our foods because they are binding agents that are used when our foods are dried   like starch  most maltodextrins are easily digested and used for energy in the body   so  while the carrots and sweet potatoes are probably fine  they did not contain ingredients that i wanted to feed my baby   the biggest issue being that this information was not included in the product description on amazon  baby and mama approved

if you haven t bought a 240 count package of tea before  let me tell you how much it is   a lot   that s how much   this is the church s morning tea supply for the next few months the pyramid teabag is very nice   the bag material appears to be a standard tea bag like the kind used by celestial seasonings  but the four corners of the bag were formed into a pyramid instead of a square   a tea bag  of course  will retain some air as it is steeped   a square tea bag will float flat on the surface of the water   a pyramid  on the other hand  floats as an upside down pyramid   i don t know why the air doesn t collect in one of the corners  but it doesn t   bottom line  the rest of the bag  and thus the tea  is submerged  which makes for a  in my opinion  much better steep than a square bag the tea itself is quite enjoyable  although i am not a connoisseur by any means   i use one bag in the morning to make about a liter of tea  then down it with a big breakfast   this tea is not as in your face earthy as the last black tea i tried  a yorkshire blend   and i like it better   it still has that earth and slightly bitter flavor  but it is a little sweeter than the yorkshire blend i tried  probably because it is made from the tips of the plant  as the product name states  or perhaps it came from a different and better crop  or some other reason that i do not know   i am not one to add anything to my tea for sweetening or any other alteration  so i prefer this tea there s just a ton of it   two hundred forty tea bags in an absurd quantity  very good  and a lot of it

while mainly hibiscus leaves and rosehips  as the label indicates  the vanilla adds a bright aroma and the raspberry a hefty mouthfeel  i did not taste a lot of vanilla  the berry factor weighs more perhaps in the color and the thick quality of the brew  it s not a processed black tea but an herbal one in its lack of caffeination  the amount of leaves in the pyramidal bag is less than i expected  but immersion for 6 minutes  4 6 recommended  brought out the stronger flavor i favor i paired this with fruit muffins  a dessert tart or cake would also fit this beverage well  the taste is not overpowering  and maybe subtler than i expected  but it tastes  clean  and with sweetener  i tried splenda s  nectresse  also reviewed   it brings out more liveliness  without that addition  i found the tea lacked the kick i desired  all in all  delicate  but refined  fine pairing with light fruit cakes or muffins

pasta with pre made sauce isn t very hard to make   you boil water  drain it  and heat some sauce in the microwave  the idea that somebody needed to prepackage it and make it simpler seemed to be going a bit far to me  but the convenience factor of having a meal in 60 seconds  not needing a refrigerator and being able to heat it up in workplaces made me want to see how much i d be compromising for convenience i shouldn t have fretted  after all  barilla makes tomato and basil sauce and heating it after taking it out of a jar is no different from heating it while it s in its own compartment in a microwavable tray  i used to make my own pasta  whole wheat is harder to work with so i got lazy  and if i can accept dried pasta  then the idea of pasta that s not dried but has the right water content to be microwaved isn t as odd as it seemed it turned out to be just as advertised  you cook it for 60 seconds  a tray of sauce lifts out  and you pour it on the pasta  it tastes just as good as if you bought dried pasta and a jar of sauce  you don t lose out by getting something microwavable the company is also fairly honest about the ingredients and it says right on the front of the package that it s made with 51  whole wheat pasta   that s a lot better than the competition  which likes to say  made with whole grain  even though they refine some of the grain and pretend the two are separate ingredients  all the ingredients seem good and wholesome except for the mysterious  natural flavors  ingredient  it s not necessarily bad for you  but it s not necessarily good for you  i have no way of knowing  this is low in saturated fat  the non saturated variety comes from olive oil  which is good for you  and the only thing that it s a bit high in is sugar  it contains eight grams  but i d guess that it would contain about five grams if there were no added sugar  since it occurs naturally in other ingredients the bottom line is that this is as good as store bought pasta that you boil yourself  if you like barilla s jarred sauce  and you like their dried pasta  then you ll like this just as much and you ll like the convenience  much better than i expected

amazon vine sent me a container of a new product  by the makers of splenda  called nectresse  i have been a fan of splenda since several members of my family were diabetic  sugar gives me a headache  splenda didn t  but  i personally found splenda disappointing to bake with  and the half and half mix really was not a save for me meanwhile  i gave up any hope of making several items  until something even better came along  then came nectresse  made from monk fruit  it is said that the monks in vietnam began cultivating the fruit some 800 years ago  it is naturally sweet and low calorie and is now in this wonderful new product  my husband and i tried it this morning in our tea  we don t require tea to be over sweet  but i like to take the biting edge off the brand of green tea that i buy  we both agree that the taste of this is product is full and sweet  i didn t get a headache  i can t wait to make biscotti this year  i will update this review when i am able to share that experience for now  we find nectresse an excellent product and look forward to finding many more ways to use it  nectresse a sweet option

of four of my cats only two eat canned food regularly and one nibbles canned food when the mood strikes him   my fourth cat never touches any canned food   therfore  the two that eat the canned food regularly liked this   they immediately ate some and although they did not finish all the food  i can tell they liked it enough to eat it regularly   ps it is not too unusual for me to find canned food left behind no matter what the variety   right now they ve had it a couple of nights in a row  the one that periodically nibbles canned food did not touch it what i like about this food is that it does not stink  many canned foods smell up a house the minute they are opened  such as the meow mix  surf  n turf variety pack  2 75 ounce cups  pack of 48   this one s smell is barely detectable to me the label also indicates this food meets the cats nutritional needs the first five ingredients are chicken  turkey  chicken broth  chicken liver  ground flaxseeds  etc  the peas  which are the 8th ingredient in the list  are noticeable but the last 8 ingredients in the mixture  artichokes  cranberries  pumpkin  tomato  blueberries  broccoli  cabbage  kale  parsley  were not visible  perhaps they were blended in  there are also various vitamins and supplements in the mixture as well as the necessary taurine overall  my regular canned food eating cats liked this and i believe the ingredients are healthy enough for them   i would consider purchasing this or another flavor for them if i wanted to introduce some diversity in their diet besides their usual friskies savory shreds cat food variety pack  8 25 pound or other friskies canned food they are use to  almost  whisker lickin good

i have fed my cats and dogs nothing but purina products for the past 30 years   i have never had any problems with any of my animals all these years and they have all lived to a ripe old age   when other pets were dying from contaminated food i continued with purina friskies and had no scares at all   there were absolutely no recalls on any purina food i learned my lesson when i tried another brand   the cats ate it only once and wouldn t touch it after that   that s when i looked on the lable  it was bought in my local grocery but was made in thailand  i have nothing against thailand  but i dread to think what was in that food  thai cats must be hardy souls to live on that stuff   this situation made me more dedicated to purina i have tried the expensive  healthy  pet foods and my animals don t like them  so  unless you want to take out a second mortgage on your home to afford  healthy  pet foods  you can rely on good old purina products  unhealthy pet food     bah

the deer in my area  private land in the south western part of virginia  really like this product  i poured it out once in front of a trail camera and the deer activity remained fairly constant at the location for 2 weeks  they scraped the first 2 3 inches of soil off trying to get to it  i poured it out again when the acorns started falling and there was probably 50  less activity at the site but  they were still visiting the site  because these are not farm country deer and reside mostly deep in the mountains  i will continue to use the product to provide the deer with minerals they would otherwise have a difficult time locating naturally and because they apparantly like the taste smell because they usually find it the same day i put it out  not to mention  it s much easier to carry up the mountain than a 50lb sack of corn  works

i ve tried several brands of instant over the last couple of years  i m not a heavy coffee drinker anymore so i don t bother to brew it  but i ve enjoyed coffee in the past and was a fan of melitta  peet s  and otherwise good brands of coffee  when it comes to instant most are drech  they re nearly undrinkable   i even bought expensive star bucks instant and it was the worst i ve had  horribly bitter with a pronounced chemical taste  that seems to be how most instants are  i m not sure how jacob s does it but this instant tastes like fresh brewed coffee  it has a very neutral taste  but very good and clean and inoffensive at the same time  i enjoyed this coffee so much i ve convinced other friends to try it and they ve enjoyed it as well  best instant i ve had and even better than a lot of fresh roasts as well  best instant you can buy

raccoons were devouring about a gallon of seed from my large bird feeder every night  at  60 per 50 lb bag of seed that gets pricey    the squirrels i had baffled but the raccoons were driving me mad  and who likes to be outsmarted by a raccoon   so i bought this fence charger  wrapped a coil of bare wire around 1 25  pvc pipe and slid the pipe over the mounting pole for the feeder   this is done in such a way that an animal climbing the pole will have its front paws on coil and back paws on metal pole or ground   i also mounted it high enough so that snow won t short it out  the hot lead goes to the coil  ground goes to ground   no more raccoon problem  works a treat

nectresse was given to me free for review i am not a splenda fan  particularly  i don t like the taste as much as i like stevia  since nectresse is from the makers of splenda  i was not sure what to expect  but i ended up quite liking this product  i did not feel like it had a noticeable aftertaste  as some have stated  but i did notice that it is very sweet  so a little goes a long way  this is good news  since i think the price is rather high  it makes the difference in whether or not i would actually buy the product  and i probably would  i did try nectresse in both herbal tea and in coffee  and i liked it in both beverages  i did not try it in a cold beverage  but noticed that it dissolved easily  and it should be fine in cold beverages  as well  when you first use the product  adjust down by at least half and see if this is the right amount of sweetness for you  i found that i was using about half of what i originally use with other sweeteners  also  because a less can be used  the gastrointestinal problems that some have mentioned might not be a problem  i ve used it a few times and have not been bothered  i quite like this product
